ENTRY.DESCRIPTION: Name of the PHP Class of this pager.
ENTRY.EXAMPLE: pagerClassName = Tx_PtExtlist_Domain_Model_Pager_DefaultPager

ENTRY.DESCRIPTION: Name of the template class for this pager.
ENTRY.EXAMPLE: templatePath = EXT:pt_extlist/Resources/Private/Templates/Pager/Default.html

ENTRY.DESCRIPTION: Indicates if this pager is enabled.
Indicates if the firstLink is shown.
Indicates if the previousLink is shown.
Indicates if the firstLink is shown.
Indicates if the nextLink is shown.
The unique identifier of this filter.
The label wich is displayed beside the filter.
The default value which is shown or selected by default.
Comma separated list of user groups wich have access to this filter.

WARNING: Which one to choose??? Identifier of a defined data field. The filter affects on this data field. If more than on fieldIdentifier is given, the resulting query is linked with or. Either a single identifier of a defined field, a comma separated list of identifiers or '*' to use all defined fields.
Name of the PHP Class of this filter.
ENTRY.EXAMPLE: Tx_PtExtlist_Domain_Model_Filter_StringFilter

ENTRY.DESCRIPTION: Invert the constraint of this filter.
Show a controle to invert this filter.

A cObject definition to render every selct option. With {field:FIELDNAME} you can accedd all display Fields. Additional the implicit defined fields [allDisplayFields] for all defined displayFields and [rowCount] for the count of the entrys with this option are possible.
One or multiple identifiers of previously defined data fields.
ENTRY.DEFAULT: If not set, the field defined in fieldIdentifier is used.

ENTRY.DESCRIPTION: List of filters that are not considered for the group query of this filter.
ENTRY.DATATYPE: String / Comma separated list of filterIdentifiers.

ENTRY.DESCRIPTION: Show the rowcount if the select filter is filled with grouped data.
Instant submit filter if a value is selected.
If a default value for a filter is set in TypoScript, the filter will be set to this value if it is resetted. If this is set to 0, the filter will be resetted to an empty value.
Label of an option that is added to the select list. If this option is selected, the filter is inactive.
The submitted value for the inactiveOption described above.
Defines the string that is shown as breadcrumb for the filter. You can use '%v' for the filter's value and '%l' for the filter's label.
ENTRY.EXAMPLE: breadCrumbString = %l equals '%v'

ENTRY.DESCRIPTION: Defines explicit options to display in a data filter. If options are set, no data is fetched from the database. There are to variants to define the data. See the example for details.
Main TS-key for all pt_extlist settings.
Holds configuration for all list identifiers configured by array key.
Basic settings for pt_extlist

Define the session storage adapter that should be used in uncached mode. Posible values are the classes described below or any other class that implements the interface Tx_PtExtbase_State_Session_Storage_AdapterInterface.
ENTRY.POSIBLEVALUES: Tx_PtExtbase_State_Session_Storage_SessionAdapter: Default browser session storage adapter. Tx_PtExtbase_State_Session_Storage_FeUserSessionAdapter: TYPO3 fe_user bases session storage.

ENTRY.DESCRIPTION: Define the session storage adapter that should be used in cached mode. Posible values are the classes described below or any other class that implements the interface Tx_PtExtbase_State_Session_Storage_AdapterInterface.
ENTRY.POSIBLEVALUES: Tx_PtExtlist_Domain_StateAdapter_Storage_NullStorageAdapter: Hold every session variable as GET parameters in the URL. Use this adapter if you want to use realURL. Tx_PtExtlist_Domain_StateAdapter_Storage_DBStorageAdapter: Save the session variables into the database and add an identifier for this db-entry to the GET variables. Use this adapter if you want to handle many parameters and keep the URL length constant.

ENTRY.DESCRIPTION: Holds configuration for a single list identifier. This is where the main part of your list configuration has to be set up.
List default values.
The default sorting column while no other sortng ist set. Direction can be set with DESC or ASC after the column identifier.
Holds the configuration for the data backend to be used with this configuration. Configurable values depend on individual backend, e.g. TYPO3-Backend, MySQL-Backen, ExtBase-Backend etc.
Backend configuration for connecting to native MySQL databases. DSN needs to be configured.
Defines datasource for (MySQL) data backend.
Defines hostname of mysql database server.
ENTRY.POSIBLEVALUES: All valid addresses for servers (IP-Addresses and URLs)

ENTRY.DESCRIPTION: Port number on which MySQL database server is listening.
Name of database to be used for connection.
Username to be used for database connection.
Password to be used for database connection.
Holds the FROM clause of a mysql query without the FROM keyword.
ENTRY.EXAMPLE: static_countries LEFT JOIN static_territories AS st_subcontinent ON (static_countries.cn_parent_tr_iso_nr = st_subcontinent.tr_iso_nr)

ENTRY.DESCRIPTION: Holds the WHERE clause of a mysql query without the WHERE keyword.
Holds the GROUP BY clause of a mysql query without the GROUP BY keyword.
ENTRY.EXAMPLE: st_continent

ENTRY.DESCRIPTION: TYPO3 Backend. Inherits the Features from the MySql Backend but the datasource is already configured. The TYPO3 Backend handles enableFields automatically in where clauses.
Define tables to be used with enable fields. TYPO3 special fields (deleted, hidden) are automatically applied to query.
ENTRY.DATATYPE: Comma seperated list of table names and aliases (optional).
ENTRY.EXAMPLE: static_countries, static_territories st_continent

ENTRY.DESCRIPTION: Use enableFields for alle tables that are defined with key tables.
Extbase Repository Backend.
Defines raw datasource fields, wich can than combined and processed in to table fields.
Named definition of a single data field.
ENTRY.EXAMPLE:
<![CDATA[
name_local {
	table = static_countries
	field = cn_short_local
	isSortable = 1
}

ENTRY.DESCRIPTION: The table, this field belongs to.
Name of the tables field.
Insert a individual SQL snippet.
Holds the tables column definitions.
Either a single identifier of a defined field, a comma separated list of identifiers or '*' to use all defined fields.
A label for this element.
A list of userfunctions to render the field value.

Define sorting for this column. A single sorting definition consists either of a fieldidentifier or a fieldidentifier followed by direction. The direction can be fixed with adding a '!' in front of the direction.
Image for ascending ordered column header.
Image for descending ordered column header.
Image for unordered column header.
Holds the renderer configuration.

A list of chained renderer classes that work on list data structures. The default renderer class uses the column configuration, to render the list of field data in a list of rows and columns. By default this renderer iscalled at position 100. All defined renderer before 100 work on a field data list, while renderer after 100 work on a column list data structure.
Configuration of a single renderer.
The class name of the renderers php class.
Defines aggregates of data fields.
Named definition of a single data field.
Defined aggregate methods.
The scope for the aggregation can be either set to the current page or to the whole query. Aggregates for the current page are calculated internally without an additonal database query.
Holds the aggregates columns definitions.
Holds all pager configuration
Sets the items per page. A value of 0 means to show all entrys.
Holds an array of all defined pagers
Identifier of a pager
Configuration for default pager
Configuration for delta pager. Shows only a configured amount of pagenumbers around the current page.
Configuration for minimal pager. Shows only Forward and backward links without the page numbers.
Holds all filterbox configurations.
Show a reset link for all filters of this filterBox.
Show a submit button for this filterBox.
Holds the configuration of the filters of this filter box.
Define the size of the string field.
Define the maximum length of the string field.
Shows a string filter.
Shows a filter to do a fullText query. The execution is database specific. If you are using a MySQL database, you have to add a fullText index to the relevant fields first.
Renders a filter with buttons.
Maximum of items tos show.
Minimum Color
ENTRY.EXAMPLE: minColor = #1c448d

ENTRY.DESCRIPTION: Maximum Color
ENTRY.EXAMPLE: maxColor = #b8cffa

ENTRY.DESCRIPTION: Minimum size of tags in pixel.
Maximum size of tags in pixel
A proxy filter is not displayed. It uses a filter from an other list defined by the proxy path and sets the result constraint to the given field.
Path to a filter from an other list. The path has the format [listId].[filterBoxId].[filterId]
Path to the header partial.
Path to the body partial.
Path to the aggregate row partial.
